{{cpp/experimental/lib extensions 2/propagate_const/navbar}}

{{ddcl | since=libfund_ts_2| 1=
constexpr explicit operator bool() const;
}}

Checks whether the wrapped pointer-like object, {{c|t_}}, is null.

===Parameters===
(none)

===Return value===
{{c|true}} if the wrapped object is not null, otherwise {{c|false}}. Equivalent to {{c|(bool)t_}}.
